attributes.action: Allow users of this site to correct spelling mistakes in petitions
attributes.additional_details:
The spelling and  the grammar  in some petitions  is  extremely poor.    Some petitions are unintelligible.

The abbreviations of  some technical  terms  are either ambiguous  or unknown.

Therefore, please permit  users of this site to edit  submitted petitions.

Alternatively,   allow users  to  rate petitions  with a system of "stars"
